comments:
3.2RC4

Multi-select an array and its first partition in the variables view ([0...99]), results in CCE:

Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: org/eclipse/debug/internal/ui/views/variables/IndexedValuePartition incompatible with org/eclipse/jdt/debug/core/IJavaValue

Fixed in VariablesView. Refactored the "details computation" code to use a job of queued elements needing details. The previous code only checked if the first element in the selection was an "value partition", not checking subsequent elements.
